holidays.title: Armed Forces Day (Guatemala)
holidays.description: From attending parades to staging protests, learn how to celebrate like Guatemalans today.

holidays.title: Clean Your Disposal Day
holidays.description: Get your kitchen smelling fresh and your garbage disposal working smoothly.

holidays.title: Congo Independence Day
holidays.description: Buckle your seatbelts; fly with us to the Democratic Republic of Congo for Independence Day celebrations.

holidays.title: International Day of Parliamentarism
holidays.description: In a parliamentary democracy, citizens elect representatives and take their future into their own hands.

holidays.title: National Corvette Day
holidays.description: Expand your knowledge about the Corvette and how it shaped the American car industry.

holidays.title: National Meteor Watch Day
holidays.description: What are meteors? Why are they important? Read on to find out…

holidays.title: National OOTD Day
holidays.description: Have you chosen your outfit of the day? Open up your closet and get started now!

holidays.title: Philippine-Spanish Friendship Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Filipino and Spanish friendship that endures to this day.

holidays.title: Sacred Heart
holidays.description: It’s all about the greatest love we’ve ever known this holiday, the love of Jesus Christ.

holidays.title: Social Media Day
holidays.description: First there was the telephone, then the fax machine, and then social media.

holidays.title: Angela Raiola’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. star attracted a mob following because of her over-the-top personality.

holidays.title: Fantasia Barrino’s Birthday
holidays.description: Barrino struggled financially for years, but she kept on making music. Her passion has borne fruit.

holidays.title: Michael Phelps’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nicknamed the ‘Flying Fish,’ Phelps is regarded as one of the greatest athletes of all time.

holidays.title: Mike Tyson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mike Tyson is undoubtedly the most feared boxing champion of all time.
